dataSetInformation.common:synonyms: Alumina-Carbon bricks; Al2O3-C refractories; Aluminum oxide-Carbon refractory material; A-C Refractories
Alumina-Carbon bricks; Al2O3-C refractories; Aluminum oxide-Carbon refractory material; A-C Refractories
dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: Alumina–Carbon Refractory refers to a high-temperature resistant material composed mainly of alumina (Al2O3) and carbon. It is characterized by processing level and technical aspects including the type of treatment it has undergone, compliance with specific standards, quality metrics, application or usage information, its production route, and the name of the primary educt (raw material). The description also indicates if this refractory material is part of a production mix or consumption mix and specifies the availability location such as 'to consumer' or 'at plant'. The details are provided in a comma-separated list.
氧化铝-碳耐火材料指的是一种以氧化铝(Al2O3)和碳为主要成分的耐高温材料。它包含处理级别和技术方面的特点，如所经历的处理类型、特定标准的合规性、质量指标、应用或使用信息、生产路线，以及原料名称。描述还指出这种耐火材料是生产混合物还是消费混合物的一部分，并指明了材料的可用位置，如'向消费者'或'在工厂'。详细信息以逗号分隔。
